description: An interesting quarterly report about rocket launchers and recoilless rifles.  There are lots of large, exciting photos of explosions and weaponry.

variants.description: An interesting quarterly report about rocket launchers and recoilless rifles.  There are lots of large, exciting photos of explosions and weaponry.

name.str_pl: copies of Launchers, Lobbers and Rockets Engineer

variants.description: DIY guide about different ballistics launchers, how they work, and how to build one.
The book shows the history of soviet Multiple Rocket Launcher systems, developed in a late 1930s, the reasons to use it, problem that was solved in process, and tactics of using.

name.str_pl: copies of The Rocket Propelled Grenade

variants.description: Part of a big series about different small arms, this book tells about RPG series - how it born, how it live, and how it used in modern times.

Professional magazine about artillery, published by US Field Artillery Corpse.  Lot of articles analyze using modern artillery in different wars, modern and future technologies, and the most fresh researches about ballistics and field engineering.

name.str_pl: copies of Jane's Mortars and Rocket Launchers

description: An incredibly detailed guide to modern rockets, mortars, grenade launchers, and recoilless weaponry.  Lavishly illustrated with color photographs, it contains a wealth of information.

name.str_pl: copies of Jane's Mortars and Rocket Launchers

variants.description: An incredibly detailed guide to modern rockets, mortars, grenade launchers, and recoilless weaponry.  Lavishly illustrated with color photographs, it contains a wealth of information.

Part of a big series about different small arms, this book tells about M79 - created as a gap between hand grenade and the light mortar, this weapon became iconic symbol of Vietnam War, and still serve his role perfectly.

name.str: Catalogue of Standard Ordnance Items: Volume 3 & 4
name.str_pl: copies of Catalogue of Standard Ordnance Items: Volume 3 & 4

variants.description: Giant, comprehensive list of every U.S. Army's weapon, equipment and ammunition that was used during World War II, with small, but detailed information about each of them.  Volume 3 describes light weapons like grenade launchers, recoilless rifles, man-portable anti-tank and air-defense missiles and mortars, and volume 4 describe different heavy ammunition from 20mm to 16 inch hand and rifle grenades.

name.str: FM 3-09: Fire Support and Field Artillery Operations
name.str_pl: copies of FM 3-09: Fire Support and Field Artillery Operations

variants.description: Official U.S. Army manual about principles and functions for fire support elements and field artillery.  Lot of it says about artillery using and operation, same with ballistic calculations.
Official U.S. Army manual about using different light weapons - M203, ITAS M41, TOW and Javelines.

name.str_pl: copies of FM 23-11: 90mm Recoilless Rifle, M67

variants.description: Official U.S. Army manual, that contain all information about using M67 - theory, practice, essential information.
